intro.title: Fundamentals in the Mindset of RAAC:
intro.subtitle: Quality, Reliability, and Creativity
intro.text: RAAC, a company launched in late 2012, has built its foundation on three fundamental values: quality, reliability, and creativity. Initially, the focus was on executing AS9100 and ISO9001 audits for the certification body Lloyds Register on a freelance basis. However, after a few weeks, the demand for consultancy services increased, prompting RAAC to also launch consultancy services. Today, RAAC strikes a good balance between providing consultancy and auditing services, all while maintaining a steadfast commitment to quality, reliability, and creativity.

1.title: RAAC CAN ASSIST YOU IF YOU WANT A CERTIFIED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

2.title: YOU WANT A CERTIFIED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

1.label: Read more
1.text: Establish / maintain a quality management system according to ISO9001, ISO14001 and 18001
1.title: QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

2.label: Read more
2.text: Aviation quality management systems according AS9100/9110/9120 EASA Part-21, Part-145
2.title: AVIATION QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS

3.label: Read more
3.text: Nadcap production processes according to the PRI checklists NDT, WLD, HT, and EDM
3.title: NADCAP PRODUCTION

seo.title: RAAC - Quality, Reliability, and Creativity in Consultancy and Auditing
seo.description: RAAC is a consultancy and auditing organization with a focus on quality, reliability, and creativity. With services in root cause analysis, interim management, and quality management system establishment and maintenance, as well as expertise in aviation quality management systems and NADCAP production processes, RAAC has the solutions your organization needs to succeed. Contact us to learn more.
